CustomProperties.Name: Submit
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A boolean to trigger the OnSubmit functionality. Only works when IsOnSubmitEnabled is set to true.

Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            Email.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor3TextValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
   RGBA(255, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        Email.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor3TextValue"
    ).cat_value))

Parent.Width - Parent.PaddingLeft - Parent.PaddingRight - (Self.BorderThickness/2)

//Max(Parent.Width - Parent.PaddingLeft - Parent.PaddingRight - (Self.BorderThickness/2), Self.Size *30 + Self.BorderThickness)

If(
        Email.IsTitleShown,
        lblEmailTitle.Y,
        Email.IsSubtitleShown,
        lblEmailSubtitle.Y,
        txtEmailInput.Y - lblEmailError.Height
    )

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            Email.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor3Value"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(255, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        Email.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor3Value"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            Email.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        Email.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            Email.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        Email.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            Email.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor1Value"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        Email.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor1Value"
    ).cat_value))
